alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Jessamine; Mercer; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:14PM EDT until July 02 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Mercer County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Garrard County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Jessamine County in central Kentucky... East central Washington County in central Kentucky... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 414 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Harrodsburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrodsburg, Burgin, Battle, Cornishville, Riverview Estates, Dixville and Bohon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
